I'm Raul Pereira da Silva, Senior System Analyst at Atos Origin. Graduated in 2001 at !UniverCidade, postgraduated in "Analysis, Project and Management of Systems" and "Ergonomics, Usability and HCI: Ergodesign and Evaluation of Interfaces" at PUC-Rio. Professional in the job market for more than eight years, holding positions in areas such as programing, supervision of trainees, requirements elicitations, project analysis, creation and development of graphical interfaces: web or desktop, with focus on usability; employing agile methods for the management. Only one more collaborator and enthusiast.
